original_title: Les Vamps - Ah ben les r’voilà
overview: Gisèle and Lucienne have chosen to relive their pilgrimage to Lourdes, the subject of their very first show. The 60-year-olds have not aged a bit! Gisèle is still Lucienne's whipping boy, and the two shrews spend their days railing against everything, with sarcastic and whimsical lines.
title: Les Vamps - Ah ben les r’voilà
